targets.expr:
(min by(id) (
  timestamp(container_last_seen{instance="$instance", id=~"$id"})
  -
  container_last_seen{instance="$instance", id=~"$id"}
  or
  time() - max_over_time(container_last_seen{instance="$instance", id=~"$id"}[$__range])
))

panels.description: empty when cgroup doesn't have cpu limit
panels.title: cpu limit %

panels.description: empty when cgroup doesn't have memory limit
panels.title: memory: rss / limit %

panels.description: empty when cgroup doesn't have memory limit
panels.title: memory: wss / limit %

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

list.definition: query_result(max by(human_name, id) (label_replace(label_replace(  last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id=~"($id_prefix)$show_children", id=~"($id_prefix)|($id_prefix)(/.*($suffix_filter).*)?", id!~"($id_prefix)($suffix_antifilter)"}[$__range])  or  (last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id=~"($id_prefix)$show_children", id=~"($id_prefix)|($id_prefix).*($suffix_filter).*", id!~"($id_prefix)($suffix_antifilter)"}[$__range]) + on() group_left() last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id="/", id="$id_prefix"}[$__range])), "human_name", "$1", "id", "$id_prefix/?(.+)"), "human_name", "<exact-prefix>", "id", "$id_prefix")) # the first part selects $prefix/suffix for general use-case, the second part selects ${prefix}suffix but only for the special case of prefix=/)
list.name: id

query.query: query_result(max by(human_name, id) (label_replace(label_replace(  last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id=~"($id_prefix)$show_children", id=~"($id_prefix)|($id_prefix)(/.*($suffix_filter).*)?", id!~"($id_prefix)($suffix_antifilter)"}[$__range])  or  (last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id=~"($id_prefix)$show_children", id=~"($id_prefix)|($id_prefix).*($suffix_filter).*", id!~"($id_prefix)($suffix_antifilter)"}[$__range]) + on() group_left() last_over_time(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{instance="$instance", namespace="", container_label_com_docker_compose_project="", cpu="total", id="/", id="$id_prefix"}[$__range])), "human_name", "$1", "id", "$id_prefix/?(.+)"), "human_name", "<exact-prefix>", "id", "$id_prefix")) # the first part selects $prefix/suffix for general use-case, the second part selects ${prefix}suffix but only for the special case of prefix=/)
